name: google-maps
label: Google Maps
description: Google Maps is use for the process of converting addresses into geographic coordinates, which you can use to place markers on a map, or position the map.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Google Maps endpoint server to which you will connect to in order to perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: API key that is configured for your account for using the Google Maps APIs.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.description: Retrieves a coordinates of the given physical address from Google Maps.
operations.title: Get Maps Geocode

parameters.title: Address
parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The physical address to be geocoded.
